name: Move To
description: Move an object to a position with an acceleration and deceleration.

conditions.name: Is moving
conditions.description: True when the object is moving.

conditions.name: Compare speed
conditions.description: Compare the current speed of the object.

params.name: Comparison
params.description: Choose the way to compare the current speed.

params.name: Speed
params.description: The speed, in pixels per second, to compare the current speed to.

conditions.name: Is enabled
conditions.description: Test if the behavior is enabled.

conditions.name: On arrived
conditions.description: Triggered when arrived at target position.

conditions.name: On hit solid
conditions.description: Triggered if 'Stop on solids' is enabled and the object hit a solid while moving.

actions.name: Move to position
actions.description: Start moving towards a position in the layout, or add a waypoint to move to next.

params.name: X
params.description: The X co-ordinate to move to.

params.name: Y
params.description: The Y co-ordinate to move to.

params.name: Mode
params.description: Whether to move directly (removing any previous waypoints), or add a new waypoint to move to after prior movements.

actions.name: Move to object
actions.description: Start moving towards an object, or add a waypoint to move to next.

params.name: Object
params.description: The object to move to.

params.name: Mode
params.description: Whether to move directly (removing any previous waypoints), or add a new waypoint to move to after prior movements.

params.name: Image point (optional)
params.description: The name or number of an image point in the object to move to. Leave 0 for object's origin.

actions.name: Move along Pathfinding path
actions.description: Start moving along all the points of a path calculated by a Pathfinding behavior on the same object.

params.name: Mode
params.description: Whether to move directly (removing any previous waypoints), or add new waypoints to move to after prior movements.

actions.name: Move along timeline
actions.description: Start moving along all the points of a timeline track with X and Y properties.

params.name: Timeline
params.description: The timeline to use a track from.

params.name: Track ID
params.description: The track ID in the timeline to use X and Y positions from. Leave empty to use first track.

params.name: Mode
params.description: Whether to move directly (removing any previous waypoints), or add new waypoints to move to after prior movements.

actions.name: Move along timeline (by name)
actions.description: Start moving along all the points of a timeline track with X and Y properties, using a string for the timeline name.

params.name: Timeline name
params.description: A string with the name of the timeline to use a track from.

params.name: Track ID
params.description: The track ID in the timeline to use X and Y positions from. Leave empty to use first track.

params.name: Mode
params.description: Whether to move directly (removing any previous waypoints), or add new waypoints to move to after prior movements.

actions.name: Stop
actions.description: Stop movement and remove all waypoints.

actions.name: Set angle of motion
actions.description: Set the angle the object is moving at.
actions.display_text: Set {my} angle of motion to [i]{0}[/i] degrees

params.name: Angle
params.description: The new angle of motion, in degrees.

params.name: Speed
params.description: The new speed of the object to set, in pixels per second.

params.name: Max Speed
params.description: The new maximum speed of the object to set, in pixels per second.

params.name: Acceleration
params.description: The new acceleration of the object to set, in pixels per second per second. Use 0 for instant acceleration.

params.name: Deceleration
params.description: The new deceleration of the object to set, in pixels per second per second. Use 0 for instant deceleration.

actions.name: Set rotate speed
actions.description: Set the turn speed for rotating towards the target position.
actions.display_text: Set {my} rotate speed to [i]{0}[/i] degrees per second

params.name: Rotate speed
params.description: The turn speed to set, in degrees per second. Use 0 to disable turning.

actions.name: Set stop on solids
actions.description: Set whether to automatically stop movement if hitting a solid object.

params.name: Enabled
params.description: Set whether to stop on solids.

actions.name: Set enabled
actions.description: Set whether this behavior is enabled.

params.name: Enabled
params.description: Set whether to enable or disable the behavior.

expressions.name: Speed
expressions.description: The current object speed, in pixels per second.

expressions.name: MaxSpeed
expressions.description: The maximum speed setting, in pixels per second.

expressions.name: Acceleration
expressions.description: The acceleration setting, in pixels per second per second.

expressions.name: Deceleration
expressions.description: The deceleration setting, in pixels per second per second.

expressions.name: RotateSpeed
expressions.description: The current maximum turn speed in degrees per second.

expressions.name: MovingAngle
expressions.description: The current angle of motion, in degrees.

expressions.name: TargetX
expressions.description: The X co-ordinate of the current target position moving towards.

expressions.name: TargetY
expressions.description: The Y co-ordinate of the current target position moving towards.

expressions.name: WaypointCount
expressions.description: The number of remaining waypoints to move to.

expressions.name: WaypointXAt
expressions.description: The X co-ordinate of a waypoint at an index.

params.name: Index
params.description: Zero-based index of waypoint.

expressions.name: WaypointYAt
expressions.description: The Y co-ordinate of a waypoint at an index.

params.name: Index
params.description: Zero-based index of waypoint.
